snippet.title: Alien Lander short play and disk drive sound (Apple II - Sierra)
snippet.description:
Alien Lander was an action simulation game published by Sierra in 1980 for the Apple ][. The player needs to land the spaceship carefully on an alien planet and save enough fuel for takeoff in order to complete the mission. The game is not strongly protected, using regular tracks with non-standard address marker.

Credits:
Cover art - quartdepomme.fr
Disk image - 4AM
